title: Anybody know what fonts are being used in these logos?
author: popinfresh

comments.content: City Market is custom, in a goofy-modulated x-height sort of way.

Dave, if you are just looking for the logo [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128214646/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=soopers) you can download an eps for King Soopers.   
   
 ![king](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128214646im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49736.gif)
